original_text: Moses sent those men out to fight. There were 1,000 men from each tribe. Phinehas, the son of Eleazar the priest, went with them. Phinehas took with him the special things from God's Holy Tent. He also took the trumpets to make sounds for the battle.
korean_text: 모세가 각 지파에 천 명씩 싸움에 보내되 제사장 엘르아살의 아들 비느하스에게 성소의 기구와 신호 나팔을 들려서 그들과 함께 전쟁에 보내매

sentences.original_text: Moses sent those men out to fight.
There were 1,000 men from each tribe.
sentences.korean_translation: 각 지파에서 천 명의 사람이 있었다.

sentences.original_text: Phinehas, the son of Eleazar the priest, went with them.
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장 엘르아사르의 아들 비느하스가 그들과 함께 갔다.

sentences.original_text: Phinehas took with him the special things from God's Holy Tent.
sentences.korean_translation: 비느하스가 하나님의 성막의 특별한 물건들을 가져갔다.

sentences.original_text: He also took the trumpets to make sounds for the battle.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 싸움을 위한 소리를 낼 나팔들을 가져갔다.
